DISSECT

Static analysis for binaries and source code

What is DISSECT?

  • Binary analysis and trait detection
  • Automatic file format identification
  • Deep inspection of executables and archives
  • Security-focused static analysis

Supported Formats

  • ELF, Mach-O, PE executables
  • Archives: tar, zip, 7z, rar, gzip
  • Containers: squashfs, ext4, iso
  • Source code and text files
